coreAttributes.name: arcane revolver
coreAttributes.description: Although this revolver appears to be of the top-break variety, there's actually no way to open and reload it, as instead of bullets, it fires concentrated arcane essences. This weapon is only seen being carried by Lyssieth's elite guards.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(draw)] [npc.her] arcane revolver, ready to use it in combat.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Aiming and firing [npc.her] arcane revolver, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to hit [npc2.name] with a powerful arcane bullet!
Taking aim at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] arcane revolver, [npc.name] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger, unleashing a powerful blast of arcane energy that slams into [npc2.namePos] torso!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(aim)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] arcane revolver, and, pulling the trigger, [npc.she] [npc.verb(manage)] to hit [npc2.herHim] right in the chest!

missDescriptions.missText: Taking aim at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] arcane revolver, [npc.name] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger, letting out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(aim)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] arcane revolver and [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc.her] target!
